        UN 17 Goals
      
  



















      
    
        The 17 Sustainable Development Goals of the United Nations
      
  
    

In 2015, the United Nations created 17 Sustainable Development Goals and aimed to achieve them by 2030. All 193 United Nations Member States agreed on these 17 goals to end poverty, ensure prosperity, and protect the planet.

For the 2022 Solution Challenge, your mission is to create a project that contributes to solving one or more of the 17 Sustainable Development Goals using Google technologies. UN 17 Sustainable Development Goals:
No Poverty |
  Zero Hunger |
  Good Health and Wellbeing |
  Quality Education |
  Gender Equality |
  Clean Water and Sanitation |
  Affordable and Clean Energy |
  Decent Work and Economic Growth |
  Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure |
  Reduced Inequalities |
  Sustainable Cities and Communities |
  Responsible Consumption and Production |
  Climate Action |
  Life Below Water |
  Life on Land |
  Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions |
  Partnerships




















No Poverty


End poverty in all its forms, everywhere. Why it matters Infographic The United Nations targets for this goal  EXAMPLE PROJECTS: DonationMatch OKO Finance Solar Freeze 













Zero Hunger


End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition, and promote sustainable agriculture. Why it matters Infographic The United Nations targets for this goal  EXAMPLE PROJECTS: IndigoDrones SkillLab Apic 













Good Health and Wellbeing


Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all, at all ages. Why it matters Infographic The United Nations targets for this goal  EXAMPLE PROJECTS: Kindara WonderTree mDoc 













Quality Education


Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all. Why it matters Infographic The United Nations targets for this goal  EXAMPLE PROJECTS: DonationMatch OKO Finance SkillLab 













Gender Equality


Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls.

Why it matters Infographic The United Nations targets for this goal  EXAMPLE PROJECTS: DonationMatch SkillLab Kindara 













Clean Water and Sanitation


Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all. Why it matters Infographic The United Nations targets for this goal  EXAMPLE PROJECTS: Flow 













Affordable and Clean Energy


Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable, and modern energy for all.

Why it matters Infographic The United Nations targets for this goal  EXAMPLE PROJECTS: None listedConsider submitting to this category and making an impact! Decent Work and Economic Growth


Promote sustained, inclusive, and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment, and decent work for all. Why it matters Infographic The United Nations targets for this goal  EXAMPLE PROJECTS: SkillLab DonationMatch 













Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure


Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization, and foster innovation. Why it matters Infographic The United Nations targets for this goal  EXAMPLE PROJECTS: DonationMatch OKO Finance 













Reduced Inequalities


Reduce inequality within and among countries. Why it matters Infographic The United Nations targets for this goal  EXAMPLE PROJECTS: SkillLab 













Sustainable Cities and Communities


Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient, and sustainable. Why it matters Infographic The United Nations targets for this goal  EXAMPLE PROJECTS: OKO Finance 













Responsible Consumption and Production


Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns.

Why it matters Infographic The United Nations targets for this goal  EXAMPLE PROJECTS: None listedConsider submitting to this category and making an impact! Climate Action


Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts.

Why it matters Infographic The United Nations targets for this goal  EXAMPLE PROJECTS: None listedConsider submitting to this category and making an impact! Life Below Water


Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas, and marine resources for sustainable development. Why it matters Infographic The United Nations targets for this goal  EXAMPLE PROJECTS: None listedConsider submitting to this category and making an impact! Life on Land


Protect, restore, and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, manage forests, combat desertification and biodiversity loss, and halt and reverse land degradation. Why it matters Infographic The United Nations targets for this goal  EXAMPLE PROJECTS: None listedConsider submitting to this category and making an impact! Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions


Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all, and build effective, accountable, and inclusive institutions.

Why it matters Infographic The United Nations targets for this goal  EXAMPLE PROJECTS: None listedConsider submitting to this category and making an impact! Partnerships


Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development.
